summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4839 for the improvement of Bradford Street, from Renton Avenue to 32nd Avenue South; by constructing wooden curbs and gutters and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55713, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
